name: Crave (Snejk, jernej)
description: Crave is a first person hunting game where your home, a Paleolithic cave, is infested by a bloodthirsty monster who feasts on you throughout the night time. In order to survive and regain your strenght, you must hunt down and eat the unwelcome invader. To do so you must choose between two different weapons which both require different hunting strategy, but can only use one at a time.
